transArray.content: The room is clean and hygienic. Xiaodu voice control is very convenient throughout the house. The front desk service is warm and the robot is very convenient for delivering things. The breakfast is rich and complete. The oranges in the lobby are also delicious. They also gave snacks after check-out, which is very good. Next time Come and stay.
A compliment from you is not as good as the spring breeze. I am very happy and honored to receive your recognition. We will continue to work hard and welcome you to visit us again!
